mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT(board_seq1) board_dep, board_seq1, LPAD(' ',(LEVEL-1)*4) || board_title board_title, board_cont, BOARD_DATE, MEM_ID, PARENT_SEQ1, BOARD_DEL, CTGR_SEQ1 FROM board1 START WITH parent_seq1 IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR board_seq1 = parent_seq1) ORDER BY board_dep DESC, board_seq1 ASC) where ctgr_seq1 = #{ ctgr_seq1 }
